dsOverview.title: Two Long-Term Instrumental Climatic Data Bases of the People's Republic of China

summary.p: Two PRC climate data bases, derived mainly from instrument measurements, are presented in this dataset; one consists of monthly means, extremes, or totals of 14 meteorological variables observed at 60 stations, the other contains monthly mean temperatures and monthly precipitation totals from 205 stations. The two data bases have no stations in common.
